testcase.classname: Search and place the order for products
testcase.name: User can seacrch the product in the home page and offers page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenCart Landing Page....................................passed When user searched with short name "Tom" and extract actual product.........passed Then user go and search with same short name in offers page if product exist.passed And Verify the homePageProductName and OffersPageProductName are same.......passed
